00040 class QSpyRecord {
00041     uint8_t m_rec;                            // enumerated type of the record
00042     uint8_t const *m_pos;                    // current position in the stream
00043     int32_t m_len;        // current length of the stream (till the last byte)
00044 
00045 public:
00046     QSpyRecord(uint8_t rec, uint8_t const *pos, int32_t len)
00047         : m_rec(rec), m_pos(pos), m_len(len) {
00048     }
00049     void parse(void);
00050     void parseUser(void);
00051     void error(void);
00052     bool OK(void);
00053     int32_t getInt(uint8_t size);
00054     uint32_t getUint(uint8_t size);
00055     char const *getStr(void);
00056     uint8_t const *getMem(uint8_t *pl);
00057     char const *getMatDict(char const *s);            // get MATLAB dictionary
00058 
00059 };
00060 
00061 //............................................................................
00062 static DictEntry     l_funSto[512];
00063 static DictEntry     l_objSto[256];
00064 static SigDictEntry  l_sigSto[256];
00065 static Dictionary    l_funDict(l_funSto,
00066                                sizeof(l_funSto)/sizeof(l_funSto[0]));
00067 static Dictionary    l_objDict(l_objSto,
00068                                sizeof(l_objSto)/sizeof(l_objSto[0]));
00069 static SigDictionary l_sigDict(l_sigSto,
00070                                sizeof(l_sigSto)/sizeof(l_sigSto[0]));
00071 
00072 //............................................................................
00073 static uint8_t l_objPtrSize;
00074 static uint8_t l_funPtrSize;
00075 static uint8_t l_tstampSize;
00076 static uint8_t l_sigSize;
00077 static uint8_t l_evtSize;
00078 static uint8_t l_queueCtrSize;
00079 static uint8_t l_poolCtrSize;
00080 static uint8_t l_poolBlkSize;
00081 static uint8_t l_tevtCtrSize;
00082 static uint8_t l_quiet;
00083 static FILE *  l_outFile;
00084 static FILE *  l_matFile;
00085 static char    l_line[512];            // last formatted line ready for output
00086 
00087 //............................................................................
00088 static void print(void) {
00089     if (!l_quiet) {
00090         fputs(l_line, stdout);
00091     }
00092     if (l_outFile != (FILE *)0) {
00093         fputs(l_line, l_outFile);
00094     }
00095 }
00096 //............................................................................
00097 void qsConfig(uint8_t quiet,
00098               uint8_t objPtrSize,
00099               uint8_t funPtrSize,
00100               uint8_t tstampSize,
00101               uint8_t sigSize,
00102               uint8_t evtSize,
00103               uint8_t queueCtrSize,
00104               uint8_t poolCtrSize,
00105               uint8_t poolBlkSize,
00106               uint8_t tevtCtrSize,
00107               FILE   *outFile,
00108               FILE   *matFile)
00109 {
00110     l_quiet        = quiet;
00111     l_objPtrSize   = objPtrSize;
00112     l_funPtrSize   = funPtrSize;
00113     l_tstampSize   = tstampSize;
00114     l_sigSize      = sigSize;
00115     l_evtSize      = evtSize;
00116     l_queueCtrSize = queueCtrSize;
00117     l_poolCtrSize  = poolCtrSize;
00118     l_poolBlkSize  = poolBlkSize;
00119     l_tevtCtrSize  = tevtCtrSize;
00120     l_outFile      = outFile;
00121     l_matFile      = matFile;
00122 
00123     if (l_outFile != (FILE *)0) {
00124         time_t now = time(NULL);
00125         fprintf(l_outFile, "QSPY host application %s\n"
00126                            "Copyright (c) Quantum Leaps, LLC.\n"
00127                            "%s\n", QSPY_VER, ctime(&now));
00128     }
00129 
00130     sprintf(l_line, "-T %d\n", (unsigned)tstampSize);   print();
00131     sprintf(l_line, "-O %d\n", (unsigned)objPtrSize);   print();
00132     sprintf(l_line, "-F %d\n", (unsigned)funPtrSize);   print();
00133     sprintf(l_line, "-S %d\n", (unsigned)sigSize);      print();
00134     sprintf(l_line, "-E %d\n", (unsigned)evtSize);      print();
00135     sprintf(l_line, "-Q %d\n", (unsigned)queueCtrSize); print();
00136     sprintf(l_line, "-P %d\n", (unsigned)poolCtrSize);  print();
00137     sprintf(l_line, "-B %d\n", (unsigned)poolBlkSize);  print();
00138     sprintf(l_line, "-C %d\n", (unsigned)tevtCtrSize);  print();
00139     sprintf(l_line, "\n");                              print();
00140 }
00141 //............................................................................
00142 bool QSpyRecord::OK(void) {
00143     if (m_len != (uint8_t)0) {
00144         sprintf(l_line, "********** %03u: Error %d bytes unparsed\n",
00145                (unsigned)m_rec, (int)m_len);
00146         print();
00147         return false;
00148     }
00149     return true;
00150 }
00151 //............................................................................
00152 int32_t QSpyRecord::getInt(uint8_t size) {
00153     int32_t ret = (int32_t)0;
00154 
00155     if (m_len >= size) {
00156         if (size == (uint8_t)1) {
00157             ret = (int32_t)((uint32_t)m_pos[0] << 24);
00158             ret >>= 24;                                         // sign-extend
00159         }
00160         else if (size == (uint8_t)2) {
00161             ret = (int32_t)((uint32_t)m_pos[1] << 24)
00162                             | ((uint32_t)m_pos[0] << 16);
00163             ret >>= 16;                                         // sign-extend
00164         }
00165         else if (size == (uint8_t)4) {
00166             ret = (int32_t)((((((uint8_t)m_pos[3] << 8)
00167                             | (uint8_t)m_pos[2]) << 8)
00168                               | (uint8_t)m_pos[1]) << 8)
00169                                 | (uint8_t)m_pos[0];
00170         }
00171         else {
00172             assert(0);
00173         }
00174         m_pos += size;
00175         m_len -= size;
00176     }
00177     else {
00178         m_len = -1;
00179         sprintf(l_line, "Uint overrun\n");
00180         print();
00181     }
00182     return ret;
00183 }
00184 //............................................................................
00185 uint32_t QSpyRecord::getUint(uint8_t size) {
00186     uint32_t ret = (uint32_t)0;
00187 
00188     if (m_len >= size) {
00189         if (size == (uint8_t)1) {
00190             ret = (uint32_t)m_pos[0];
00191         }
00192         else if (size == (uint8_t)2) {
00193             ret = (((uint32_t)m_pos[1] << 8) | (uint32_t)m_pos[0]);
00194         }
00195         else if (size == (uint8_t)4) {
00196             ret = ((((((uint32_t)m_pos[3] << 8)
00197                         | (uint32_t)m_pos[2]) << 8)
00198                           | (uint32_t)m_pos[1]) << 8)
00199                             | (uint32_t)m_pos[0];
00200         }
00201         else {
00202             assert(0);
00203         }
00204         m_pos += size;
00205         m_len -= size;
00206     }
00207     else {
00208         m_len = -1;
00209         sprintf(l_line, "Uint overrun\n");
00210         print();
00211     }
00212     return ret;
00213 }
00214 //............................................................................
00215 char const *QSpyRecord::getStr(void) {
00216     uint8_t const *p;
00217     int32_t l;
00218 
00219     for (l = m_len, p = m_pos; l > 0; --l, ++p) {
00220         if (*p == (uint8_t)0) {
00221             char const *s = (char const *)m_pos;
00222             m_len = l - 1;
00223             m_pos = p + 1;
00224             return s;
00225         }
00226     }
00227     m_len = -1;
00228     sprintf(l_line, "String overrun\n");
00229     print();
00230     return "";
00231 }
00232 //............................................................................
00233 uint8_t const *QSpyRecord::getMem(uint8_t *pl) {
00234 
00235     if ((m_len >= 1) && ((*m_pos) <= m_len - 1)) {
00236         uint8_t const *mem = m_pos + 1;
00237         *pl = *m_pos;
00238         m_len -= 1 + *m_pos;
00239         m_pos += 1 + *m_pos;
00240         return mem;
00241     }
00242 
00243     m_len = -1;
00244     *pl = (uint8_t)0;
00245     sprintf(l_line, "Mem overrun\n");
00246     print();
00247 
00248     return (uint8_t *)0;
00249 }
00250 //............................................................................
00251 char const *QSpyRecord::getMatDict(char const *s) {
00252     static char dict[65];
00253     char *pc = dict;
00254     while ((*s != '\0') && (pc < &dict[sizeof(dict)] - 1)) {
00255         if ((*s == '[') || (*s == ']')
00256             || (*s == '.') || (*s == ':'))
00257         {
00258             *pc++ = '_';
00259             ++s;
00260         }
00261         else {
00262             *pc++ = *s++;
00263         }
00264     }
00265     *pc = '\0';
00266     return (dict[0] == '&' ? dict+1 : dict);
00267 }
00268 //............................................................................
00269 void QSpyRecord::parseUser(void) {
00270     uint32_t f;
00271     int32_t i;
00272     uint32_t u;
00273     static char const *ifmt[] = {
00274         "%li ",  "%1i ",  "%2i ",  "%3i ",
00275         "%4i ",  "%5i ",  "%6i ",  "%7i ",
00276         "%8li ", "%9i ",  "%10i ", "%11i ",
00277         "%12i ", "%13i ", "%14i ", "%15i "
00278     };
00279     static char const *ufmt[] = {
00280         "%lu ",  "%1u ",  "%2u ",  "%3u ",
00281         "%4u ",  "%5u ",  "%6u ",  "%7u ",
00282         "%8lu ", "%9u ",  "%10u ", "%11u ",
00283         "%12u ", "%13u ", "%14u ", "%15u "
00284     };
00285     static char const *efmt[] = {
00286         "%7.0Le ",   "%9.1Le ",   "%10.2Le ",  "%11.3Le ",
00287         "%12.4Le ",  "%13.5Le ",  "%14.6Le ",  "%15.7Le ",
00288         "%16.8Le ",  "%17.9Le ",  "%18.10Le ", "%19.11Le ",
00289         "%20.12Le ", "%21.13Le ", "%22.14Le ", "%23.15Le ",
00290     };
00291 
00292     u = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00293     sprintf(l_line, "%010u User%03u: ", u, (unsigned)(m_rec - QS_USER));
00294     print();
00295 
00296     if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00297         fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u ", m_rec, u);
00298     }
00299 
00300     while (m_len > 0) {
00301         char const *s;
00302         f = getUint(1);                                 // get the format byte
00303 
00304         switch (f & 0x0F) {
00305             case QS_I8_T: {
00306                 i = getInt(1);
00307                 sprintf(l_line, ifmt[f >> 4], i);
00308                 print();
00309 
00310                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00311                     fprintf(l_matFile, ifmt[f >> 4], i);
00312                 }
00313                 break;
00314             }
00315             case QS_U8_T: {
00316                 u = getUint(1);
00317                 sprintf(l_line, ufmt[f >> 4], u);
00318                 print();
00319 
00320                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00321                     fprintf(l_matFile, ufmt[f >> 4], u);
00322                 }
00323                 break;
00324             }
00325             case QS_I16_T: {
00326                 i = getInt(2);
00327                 sprintf(l_line, ifmt[f >> 4], i);
00328                 print();
00329 
00330                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00331                     fprintf(l_matFile, ifmt[f >> 4], i);
00332                 }
00333                 break;
00334             }
00335             case QS_U16_T: {
00336                 u = getUint(2);
00337                 sprintf(l_line, ufmt[f >> 4], u);
00338                 print();
00339 
00340                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00341                     fprintf(l_matFile, ufmt[f >> 4], u);
00342                 }
00343                 break;
00344             }
00345             case QS_I32_T: {
00346                 i = getInt(4);
00347                 sprintf(l_line, ifmt[f >> 4], i);
00348                 print();
00349 
00350                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00351                     fprintf(l_matFile, ifmt[f >> 4], i);
00352                 }
00353                 break;
00354             }
00355             case QS_U32_T: {
00356                 u = getUint(4);
00357                 sprintf(l_line, ufmt[f >> 4], u);
00358                 print();
00359 
00360                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00361                     fprintf(l_matFile, ufmt[f >> 4], u);
00362                 }
00363                 break;
00364             }
00365             case QS_F32_T: {
00366                 u = (uint32_t)getUint(4);
00367                 sprintf(l_line, efmt[f >> 4], (double)(*((float *)&u)));
00368                 print();
00369 
00370                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00371                     fprintf(l_matFile, efmt[f >> 4],
00372                             (double)(*((float *)&u)));
00373                 }
00374                 break;
00375             }
00376             case QS_F64_T: {
00377                 union F64Rep {
00378                     double d;
00379                     struct UInt2 {
00380                         uint32_t u1, u2;
00381                     } i;
00382                 } data;
00383                 data.i.u1 = (uint32_t)getUint(4);
00384                 data.i.u2 = (uint32_t)getUint(4);
00385                 sprintf(l_line, efmt[f >> 4], data.d);
00386                 print();
00387 
00388                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00389                     fprintf(l_matFile, efmt[f >> 4], data.d);
00390                 }
00391                 break;
00392             }
00393             case QS_STR_T: {
00394                 s = getStr();
00395                 sprintf(l_line, "%s ", s);
00396                 print();
00397 
00398                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00399                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%s ", s);
00400                 }
00401                 break;
00402             }
00403             case QS_MEM_T: {
00404                 uint8_t l;
00405                 uint8_t const *mem = getMem(&l);
00406                 while (l-- != (uint8_t)0) {
00407                     sprintf(l_line, "%02X ", (int)*mem);
00408                     print();
00409                     if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00410                         fprintf(l_matFile, "%03d ", (int)*mem);
00411                     }
00412                     ++mem;
00413                 }
00414                 break;
00415             }
00416             case QS_SIG_T: {
00417                 u = getUint(l_sigSize);
00418                 uint32_t o = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00419                 sprintf(l_line, "%s,Obj=%s ",
00420                        l_sigDict.get(u, o),
00421                        l_objDict.get(o));
00422                 print();
00423 
00424                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00425                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%04u %10u ", u, o);
00426                 }
00427                 break;
00428             }
00429             case QS_OBJ_T: {
00430                 u = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00431                 sprintf(l_line, "%s ", l_objDict.get(u));
00432                 print();
00433 
00434                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00435                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%10u ", u);
00436                 }
00437                 break;
00438             }
00439             case QS_FUN_T: {
00440                 u = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00441                 sprintf(l_line, "%s ", l_funDict.get(u));
00442                 print();
00443 
00444                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00445                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%10u ", u);
00446                 }
00447                 break;
00448             }
00449             default: {
00450                 sprintf(l_line, "Unknown format\n");
00451                 print();
00452                 m_len = -1;
00453                 break;
00454             }
00455         }
00456     }
00457     sprintf(l_line, "\n");
00458     print();
00459     if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00460         fprintf(l_matFile, "\n");
00461     }
00462 }
00463 //............................................................................
00464 void QSpyRecord::parse(void) {
00465     uint32_t t, a, b, c, d, e;
00466     char const *s;
00467 
00468     switch (m_rec) {
00469 
00470         // QEP records .......................................................
00471         case QS_QEP_STATE_ENTRY: {
00472             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00473             b = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00474             if (OK()) {
00475                 sprintf(l_line, "           Q_ENTRY: "
00476                        "Obj=%s State=%s\n",
00477                        l_objDict.get(a),
00478                        l_funDict.get(b));
00479                 print();
00480 
00481                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00482                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u\n",
00483                             m_rec, a, b);
00484                 }
00485             }
00486             break;
00487         }
00488         case QS_QEP_STATE_EXIT: {
00489             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00490             b = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00491             if (OK()) {
00492                 sprintf(l_line, "           Q_EXIT : "
00493                        "Obj=%s State=%s\n",
00494                        l_objDict.get(a),
00495                        l_funDict.get(b));
00496                 print();
00497 
00498                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00499                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u\n",
00500                             m_rec, a, b);
00501                 }
00502             }
00503             break;
00504         }
00505         case QS_QEP_STATE_INIT: {
00506             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00507             b = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00508             c = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00509             if (OK()) {
00510                 sprintf(l_line, "           Q_INIT : "
00511                        "Obj=%s Source=%s Target=%s\n",
00512                        l_objDict.get(a),
00513                        l_funDict.get(b),
00514                        l_funDict.get(c));
00515                 print();
00516 
00517                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00518                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %10u\n",
00519                             m_rec, a, b, c);
00520                 }
00521             }
00522             break;
00523         }
00524         case QS_QEP_INIT_TRAN: {
00525             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00526             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00527             b = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00528             if (OK()) {
00529                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u ==>Init: "
00530                        "Obj=%s New=%s\n",
00531                        t,
00532                        l_objDict.get(a),
00533                        l_funDict.get(b));
00534                 print();
00535 
00536                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00537                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %10u\n",
00538                             m_rec, t, a, b);
00539                 }
00540             }
00541             break;
00542         }
00543         case QS_QEP_INTERN_TRAN: {
00544             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00545             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00546             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00547             c = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00548             if (OK()) {
00549                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u Intern : "
00550                        "Obj=%s Sig=%s Source=%s\n",
00551                        t,
00552                        l_objDict.get(b),
00553                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00554                        l_funDict.get(c));
00555                 print();
00556 
00557                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00558                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %10u\n",
00559                             m_rec, t, a, b, c);
00560                 }
00561             }
00562             break;
00563         }
00564         case QS_QEP_TRAN: {
00565             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00566             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00567             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00568             c = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00569             d = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00570             if (OK()) {
00571                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u ==>Tran: "
00572                        "Obj=%s Sig=%s Source=%s New=%s\n",
00573                        t,
00574                        l_objDict.get(b),
00575                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00576                        l_funDict.get(c),
00577                        l_funDict.get(d));
00578                 print();
00579 
00580                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00581                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %10u %10u\n",
00582                             m_rec, t, a, b, c, d);
00583                 }
00584             }
00585             break;
00586         }
00587         case QS_QEP_IGNORED: {
00588             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00589             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00590             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00591             c = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00592             if (OK()) {
00593                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u Ignored: "
00594                        "Obj=%s Sig=%s Active=%s\n",
00595                        t,
00596                        l_objDict.get(b),
00597                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00598                        l_funDict.get(c));
00599                 print();
00600 
00601                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00602                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %10u\n",
00603                             m_rec, t, a, b, c);
00604                 }
00605             }
00606             break;
00607         }
00608         case QS_QEP_DISPATCH: {
00609             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00610             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00611             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00612             c = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
00613             if (OK()) {
00614                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u Disp==>: "
00615                        "Obj=%s Sig=%s Active=%s\n",
00616                        t,
00617                        l_objDict.get(b),
00618                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00619                        l_funDict.get(c));
00620                 print();
00621 
00622                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00623                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %10u\n",
00624                             m_rec, t, a, b, c);
00625                 }
00626             }
00627             break;
00628         }
00629 
00630         // QF records ........................................................
00631         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_ADD:
00632         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_REMOVE: {
00633             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00634             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00635             b = getUint(1);
00636             if (OK()) {
00637                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u AO.%s : "
00638                        "Active=%s Prio=%2u\n",
00639                        t,
00640                        (m_rec == QS_QF_ACTIVE_ADD ? "ADD" : "REM"),
00641                        l_objDict.get(a),
00642                        b);
00643                 print();
00644 
00645                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00646                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %2u\n",
00647                             m_rec, t, a, b);
00648                 }
00649             }
00650             break;
00651         }
00652         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_SUBSCRIBE:
00653         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_UNSUBSCRIBE: {
00654             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00655             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00656             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00657             if (OK()) {
00658                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u AO.%s: "
00659                        "Active=%s Sig=%s\n",
00660                        t,
00661                        (m_rec == QS_QF_ACTIVE_SUBSCRIBE ? "SUB " : "USUB"),
00662                        l_objDict.get(b),
00663                        l_sigDict.get(a, b));
00664                 print();
00665 
00666                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00667                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u\n",
00668                             m_rec, t, a, b);
00669                 }
00670             }
00671             break;
00672         }
00673         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_POST_FIFO:
00674         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_POST_LIFO: {
00675             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00676             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00677             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00678             c = getUint(1);
00679             d = getUint(l_queueCtrSize);
00680             e = getUint(l_queueCtrSize);
00681             if (OK()) {
00682                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u AO.%cIFO: Obj=%s "
00683                        "Evt(Sig=%s, Pool=%1u, Ref=%2u) "
00684                        "Queue(nFree=%3u, nMin=%3u)\n",
00685                        t,
00686                        (m_rec == QS_QF_ACTIVE_POST_FIFO ? 'F' : 'L'),
00687                        l_objDict.get(b),
00688                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00689                        (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F),
00690                        d, e);
00691                 print();
00692 
00693                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00694                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %3u %3u %4u %4u\n",
00695                             m_rec, t, a, b,
00696                             (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F),
00697                             d, e);
00698                 }
00699             }
00700             break;
00701         }
00702         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_GET:
00703         case QS_QF_EQUEUE_GET: {
00704             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00705             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00706             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00707             c = getUint(1);
00708             d = getUint(l_queueCtrSize);
00709             if (OK()) {
00710                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u %s "
00711                        "%s Evt(Sig=%s, Pool=%1u, Ref=%2u) "
00712                        "Queue(nUsed=%3u)\n",
00713                        t,
00714                        (m_rec == QS_QF_ACTIVE_GET ? "AO.GET : Active="
00715                                                   : "EQ.GET : EQueue="),
00716                        l_objDict.get(b),
00717                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00718                        (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F),
00719                        d);
00720                 print();
00721 
00722                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00723                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %3u %3u %4u\n",
00724                             m_rec, t, a, b,
00725                             (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F),
00726                             d);
00727                 }
00728             }
00729             break;
00730         }
00731         case QS_QF_ACTIVE_GET_LAST:
00732         case QS_QF_EQUEUE_GET_LAST: {
00733             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00734             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00735             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00736             c = getUint(1);
00737             if (OK()) {
00738                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u %s "
00739                        "%s Evt(Sig=%s, Pool=%1u, Ref=%2u)\n",
00740                        t,
00741                        (m_rec == QS_QF_ACTIVE_GET_LAST ? "AO.GETL: Active="
00742                                                        : "EQ.GETL: EQueue="),
00743                        l_objDict.get(b),
00744                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00745                        (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F));
00746                 print();
00747 
00748                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00749                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %3u %3u\n",
00750                             m_rec, t, a, b,
00751                             (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F));
00752                 }
00753             }
00754             break;
00755         }
00756         case QS_QF_EQUEUE_INIT: {
00757             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00758             b = getUint(l_queueCtrSize);
00759             if (OK()) {
00760                 sprintf(l_line, "           EQ.INIT: Obj=%s Len=%2u\n",
00761                        l_objDict.get(a),
00762                        b);
00763                 print();
00764 
00765                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00766                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u\n",
00767                             m_rec, a, b);
00768                 }
00769             }
00770             break;
00771         }
00772         case QS_QF_EQUEUE_POST_FIFO:
00773         case QS_QF_EQUEUE_POST_LIFO: {
00774             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00775             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00776             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00777             c = getUint(1);
00778             d = getUint(l_queueCtrSize);
00779             e = getUint(l_queueCtrSize);
00780             if (OK()) {
00781                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u EQ.%cIFO: Obj=%s "
00782                        "Evt(Sig=%s, Pool=%1u, Ref=%2u) "
00783                        "Queue(nFree=%3u, nMin=%3u)\n",
00784                        t,
00785                        (m_rec == QS_QF_EQUEUE_POST_FIFO ? 'F' : 'L'),
00786                        l_objDict.get(b),
00787                        l_sigDict.get(a, b),
00788                        (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F),
00789                        d, e);
00790                 print();
00791 
00792                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00793                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u %3u %3u %4u %4u\n",
00794                             m_rec, t, a, b,
00795                             (uint32_t)(c >> 6), (uint32_t)(c & 0x3F),
00796                             d, e);
00797                 }
00798             }
00799             break;
00800         }
00801         case QS_QF_MPOOL_INIT: {
00802             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00803             b = getUint(l_poolCtrSize);
00804             if (OK()) {
00805                 sprintf(l_line, "           MP.INIT: Obj=%s nBlocks=%4u\n",
00806                        l_objDict.get(a),
00807                        b);
00808                 print();
00809 
00810                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00811                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u\n",
00812                             m_rec, a, b);
00813                 }
00814             }
00815             break;
00816         }
00817         case QS_QF_MPOOL_GET: {
00818             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00819             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00820             b = getUint(l_poolCtrSize);
00821             c = getUint(l_poolCtrSize);
00822             if (OK()) {
00823                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u MP.GET : Obj=%s "
00824                        "nFree=%4u nMin=%4u\n",
00825                        t,
00826                        l_objDict.get(a),
00827                        b, c);
00828                 print();
00829 
00830                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00831                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %4u %4u\n",
00832                             m_rec, t, a, b, c);
00833                 }
00834             }
00835             break;
00836         }
00837         case QS_QF_MPOOL_PUT: {
00838             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00839             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00840             b = getUint(l_poolCtrSize);
00841             if (OK()) {
00842                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u MP.PUT : Obj=%s "
00843                        "nFree=%4u\n",
00844                        t,
00845                        l_objDict.get(a),
00846                        b);
00847                 print();
00848 
00849                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00850                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %4u\n",
00851                             m_rec, t, a, b);
00852                 }
00853             }
00854             break;
00855         }
00856         case QS_QF_PUBLISH: {
00857             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00858             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00859             b = getUint(1);
00860             if (OK()) {
00861                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u PUBLISH: "
00862                        "Evt(Sig=%s, Pool=%1u, Ref=%2u)\n",
00863                        t,
00864                        l_sigDict.get(a, 0),
00865                        (uint32_t)(b >> 6), (uint32_t)(b & 0x3F));
00866                 print();
00867 
00868                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00869                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %10u\n",
00870                             m_rec, t, a,
00871                             (uint32_t)(b >> 6), (uint32_t)(b & 0x3F));
00872                 }
00873             }
00874             break;
00875         }
00876         case QS_QF_NEW: {
00877             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00878             a = getUint(l_evtSize);
00879             c = getUint(l_sigSize);
00880             if (OK()) {
00881                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u NEW    : Evt(Sig=%s, size=%5u)\n",
00882                        t,
00883                        l_sigDict.get(c, 0),
00884                        a);
00885                 print();
00886 
00887                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00888                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %4u\n",
00889                             m_rec, t, a, c);
00890                 }
00891             }
00892             break;
00893         }
00894         case QS_QF_GC_ATTEMPT:
00895         case QS_QF_GC: {
00896             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00897             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
00898             b = getUint(1);
00899             if (OK()) {
00900                 sprintf(l_line,
00901                        "%010u %s : Evt(Sig=%s, Pool=%1d, Ref=%2d)\n",
00902                        t,
00903                        (m_rec == QS_QF_GC_ATTEMPT ? "GC-ATT" : "GC    "),
00904                        l_sigDict.get(a, 0),
00905                        (uint32_t)(b >> 6), (uint32_t)(b & 0x3F));
00906                 print();
00907 
00908                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00909                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %3u %3u\n",
00910                             m_rec, t, a,
00911                             (uint32_t)(b >> 6), (uint32_t)(b & 0x3F));
00912                 }
00913             }
00914             break;
00915         }
00916         case QS_QF_TICK: {
00917             a = getUint(l_tevtCtrSize);
00918             if (OK()) {
00919                 sprintf(l_line, "           TICK   : Ctr=%10u\n", a);
00920                 print();
00921 
00922                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00923                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u\n", m_rec, a);
00924                 }
00925             }
00926             break;
00927         }
00928         case QS_QF_TIMEEVT_ARM:
00929         case QS_QF_TIMEEVT_DISARM: {
00930             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00931             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00932             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00933             c = getUint(l_tevtCtrSize);
00934             d = getUint(l_tevtCtrSize);
00935             if (OK()) {
00936                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u TE.%s: Obj=%s Act=%s "
00937                        "nTicks=%4u Interval=%4u\n",
00938                        t,
00939                        (m_rec == QS_QF_TIMEEVT_ARM ? "ARM " : "DARM"),
00940                        l_objDict.get(a),
00941                        l_objDict.get(b),
00942                        c, d);
00943                 print();
00944 
00945                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00946                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %10u %10u %10u\n",
00947                             m_rec, t, a, b, c, d);
00948                 }
00949             }
00950             break;
00951         }
00952         case QS_QF_TIMEEVT_AUTO_DISARM: {
00953             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00954             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00955             if (OK()) {
00956                 sprintf(l_line, "           TE.ADRM: Obj=%s Act=%s\n",
00957                        l_objDict.get(a),
00958                        l_objDict.get(b));
00959                 print();
00960 
00961                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00962                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u\n",
00963                             m_rec, a, b);
00964                 }
00965            }
00966             break;
00967         }
00968         case QS_QF_TIMEEVT_DISARM_ATTEMPT: {
00969             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00970             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00971             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00972             if (OK()) {
00973                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u TE.DATT: Obj=%s Act=%s\n",
00974                        t,
00975                        l_objDict.get(a),
00976                        l_objDict.get(b));
00977                 print();
00978 
00979                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00980                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %10u\n",
00981                             m_rec, t, a, b);
00982                 }
00983             }
00984             break;
00985         }
00986         case QS_QF_TIMEEVT_REARM: {
00987             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
00988             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00989             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
00990             c = getUint(l_tevtCtrSize);
00991             d = getUint(l_tevtCtrSize);
00992             e = getUint(1);
00993             if (OK()) {
00994                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u TE.RARM: Obj=%s Act=%s "
00995                        "nTicks=%4u Interval=%4u WasArmed=%1u\n",
00996                        t,
00997                        l_objDict.get(a),
00998                        l_objDict.get(b),
00999                        c, d, e);
01000                 print();
01001 
01002                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01003                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %10u %10u %10u %1u\n",
01004                             m_rec, t, a, b, c, d, e);
01005                 }
01006             }
01007             break;
01008         }
01009         case QS_QF_TIMEEVT_POST: {
01010             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
01011             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
01012             b = getUint(l_sigSize);
01013             c = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
01014             if (OK()) {
01015                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u TE.POST: Obj=%s Sig=%s Act=%s\n",
01016                        t,
01017                        l_objDict.get(a),
01018                        l_sigDict.get(b, c),
01019                        l_objDict.get(c));
01020                 print();
01021 
01022                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01023                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %10u %4u %10u\n",
01024                             m_rec, t, a, b, c);
01025                 }
01026             }
01027             break;
01028         }
01029         case QS_QF_INT_LOCK:
01030         case QS_QF_INT_UNLOCK: {
01031             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
01032             a = getUint(1);
01033             if (OK()) {
01034                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u %s: "
01035                        "IntLockNest=%2d\n",
01036                        t,
01037                        (m_rec == QS_QF_INT_LOCK ? "QF_intL" : "QF_intU"),
01038                        a);
01039                 print();
01040 
01041                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01042                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %3u\n",
01043                             m_rec, t, a);
01044                 }
01045            }
01046             break;
01047         }
01048         case QS_QF_ISR_ENTRY:
01049         case QS_QF_ISR_EXIT: {
01050             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
01051             a = getUint(1);
01052             b = getUint(1);
01053             if (OK()) {
01054                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u %s: "
01055                        "IsrNest=%2u, CurrPrio=%3u\n",
01056                        t,
01057                        (m_rec == QS_QF_ISR_ENTRY ? "QF_isrE" : "QF_isrX"),
01058                        a, b);
01059                 print();
01060 
01061                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01062                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %3u %3u\n",
01063                             m_rec, t, a, b);
01064                 }
01065             }
01066             break;
01067         }
01068 
01069         // QK records ........................................................
01070         case QS_QK_MUTEX_LOCK:
01071         case QS_QK_MUTEX_UNLOCK: {
01072             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
01073             a = getUint(1);
01074             b = getUint(1);
01075             if (OK()) {
01076                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u %s: "
01077                        "OrgPrio=%2u, CurrPrio=%3u\n",
01078                        t,
01079                        (m_rec == QS_QK_MUTEX_LOCK ? "QK_muxL" : "QK_muxU"),
01080                        a, b);
01081                 print();
01082 
01083                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01084                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %3u %3u\n",
01085                             m_rec, t, a, b);
01086                 }
01087             }
01088             break;
01089         }
01090         case QS_QK_SCHEDULE: {
01091             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
01092             a = getUint(1);
01093             b = getUint(1);
01094             if (OK()) {
01095                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u QK_sche: "
01096                        "prio=%2u, pin=%3u\n",
01097                        t, a, b);
01098                 print();
01099 
01100                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01101                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %3u %3u\n",
01102                             m_rec, t, a, b);
01103                 }
01104             }
01105             break;
01106         }
01107 
01108         // Miscallaneous QS records ..........................................
01109         case QS_SIG_DICTIONARY: {
01110             a = getUint(l_sigSize);
01111             b = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
01112             s = getStr();
01113             if (OK()) {
01114                 l_sigDict.put(a, b, s);
01115                 sprintf(l_line, "           Sig Dic: %08X,Obj=%08X ->%s\n",
01116                        a, b, s);
01117                 print();
01118 
01119                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01120                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %s=[%4u %10u];\n",
01121                         m_rec, getMatDict(s), a, b);
01122                 }
01123             }
01124             break;
01125         }
01126         case QS_OBJ_DICTIONARY: {
01127             a = getUint(l_objPtrSize);
01128             s = getStr();
01129             if (OK()) {
01130                 l_objDict.put(a, ((s[0] == '&') ? s + 1 : s));
01131                 sprintf(l_line, "           Obj Dic: %08X->%s\n",
01132                        a, s);
01133                 print();
01134 
01135                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01136                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %s=%10u;\n",
01137                             m_rec, getMatDict(s), a);
01138                 }
01139             }
01140             break;
01141         }
01142         case QS_FUN_DICTIONARY: {
01143             a = getUint(l_funPtrSize);
01144             s = getStr();
01145             if (OK()) {
01146                 l_funDict.put(a, ((s[0] == '&') ? s + 1 : s));
01147                 sprintf(l_line, "           Fun Dic: %08X->%s\n",
01148                        a, s);
01149                 print();
01150 
01151                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01152                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %s=%10u;\n",
01153                             m_rec, getMatDict(s), a);
01154                 }
01155             }
01156             break;
01157         }
01158         case QS_ASSERT: {
01159             t = getUint(l_tstampSize);
01160             a = getUint(2);
01161             s = getStr();
01162             if (OK()) {
01163                 sprintf(l_line, "%010u !ASSERT: File=%s Line=%4hu\n",
01164                        t, s, a);
01165                 print();
01166 
01167                 if (l_matFile != (FILE *)0) {
01168                     fprintf(l_matFile, "%3d %10u %4u %s\n",
01169                             m_rec, t, a, s);
01170                 }
01171             }
01172             break;
01173         }
01174 
01175         // User records ......................................................
01176         default: {
01177             if (m_rec >= QS_USER) {
01178                 parseUser();
01179             }
01180             else {
01181                 sprintf(l_line, "           ???    : Rec=%3u, Len=%3d\n",
01182                        (unsigned)m_rec, (int)m_len);
01183                 print();
01184             }
01185             break;
01186         }
01187     }
01188 }
01189 
01190 //............................................................................
01191 #define QS_FRAME            ((uint8_t)0x7E)
01192 #define QS_ESC              ((uint8_t)0x7D)
01193 #define QS_GOOD_CHKSUM      ((uint8_t)0xFF)
01194 #define QS_ESC_XOR          0x20
01195 
01196 #define QS_MAX_RECORD_SIZE  256
01197 
01198 void qsParse(uint8_t const *buf, size_t nBytes) {
01199     static uint8_t esc;
01200     static uint8_t seq;
01201     static uint8_t chksum;
01202     static uint8_t record[QS_MAX_RECORD_SIZE];
01203     static uint8_t *pos = record;                // position within the record
01204 
01205     while (nBytes-- != 0) {
01206         uint8_t b = *buf++;
01207 
01208         if (esc) {
01209             esc = (uint8_t)0;
01210             b ^= QS_ESC_XOR;
01211         }
01212         else {
01213             if (b == QS_FRAME) {
01214                 if ((chksum == QS_GOOD_CHKSUM) && (pos >= &record[3])) {
01215                     if ((uint8_t)(seq + 1) != record[0]) {
01216                         sprintf(l_line, "*** Dropped %3u records\n",
01217                                (unsigned)((record[0] - seq - 1) & 0xFF));
01218                         print();
01219                     }
01220                     seq = record[0];
01221 
01222                     QSpyRecord qrec(record[1],
01223                                     &record[2],
01224                                     (uint32_t)(pos - record - 3));
01225                     qrec.parse();
01226                 }
01227                 else {
01228                     sprintf(l_line, "*** Incorrect record past seq=%3u\n",
01229                            (unsigned)seq);
01230                     print();
01231                 }
01232                                           // get ready for the next record ...
01233                 chksum = (uint8_t)0;
01234                 pos = record;
01235                 continue;
01236             }
01237             else if (b == QS_ESC) {
01238                 esc = (uint8_t)1;
01239                 continue;
01240             }
01241         }
01242 
01243         chksum = (uint8_t)(chksum + b);
01244         if (pos < &record[sizeof(record)]) {
01245             *pos++ = b;
01246         }
01247         else {
01248             sprintf(l_line, "Error, record too long\n");
01249             print();
01250             chksum = (uint8_t)0;
01251             pos = record;
01252             esc = (uint8_t)0;
01253         }
01254     }
01255 }
Generated on Wed Feb 9 2011 15:53:25 for QSPY by  1.7.3
